sections.label: Urban/Wastewater virome
sections.query: (virome OR "viral metagenomics") AND (wastewater OR sewage OR "built environment" OR urban)

sections.label: Metagenomics methods
sections.query: metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "quality control" OR assembly OR classification)

sections.label: Influenza evolution
sections.query: (influenza OR flu) AND (evolution OR "positive selection" OR "antigenic drift" OR clade)

sections.label: H5N1 / avian influenza
sections.query: H5N1 OR "highly pathogenic avian influenza" OR HPAI

items.title: Identification of and Response to Influenza A(H5) in Off-the-Shelf Raw Milk-Santa Clara County, California, November-December 2024.
items.authors: Alessandra Løchen, Brandon Bonin, Rensen Khoshabian, Melanie Diep, Syeda Iqbal, Hailey Chua
items.journal: Clinical infectious diseases : an official publication of the Infectious Diseases Society of America
items.abstract_snippet: In November-December 2024, the County of Santa Clara Public Health Department detected influenza A and A(H5) virus in unpasteurized milk sold in the county. A(H5N1) virus surveillance of off-the-shelf unpasteurized milk led to early detection and recall of pot…
